title: Meal Planning & Delivery Site
tagline: Customized meal planning & delivery service for all dietary needs.
overview: Meal Box is a web app for personalized meal planning and delivery. Customers can choose meals based on preferences, while providers manage menus and orders.
features: Custom login for customers and meal providers with JWT & bcrypt
Separate dashboards for customers and providers
Meal customization based on dietary needs (vegan, keto, etc.)
Search & match meals based on preferences and ratings
Role-based access control (Customer, Provider, Admin)
CRUD operations for orders, profiles, and menus

title: Wheel Spot - üöóCar Shop
overview: A full-featured car shop platform with secure role-based authentication, dynamic product management, responsive UI/UX, and integrated payment system.
features: Role-based access for admin and users
All products page with search and filters
Detailed product page with buy functionality
Checkout with SurjoPay integration
Admin dashboard for managing users, products, and orders
User dashboard for viewing orders and updating profile
Track order status with progress updates

title: Matrimony Website
tagline: A responsive MERN-based platform for finding your life partner.
overview: This Matrimony web app helps users find life partners by filtering biodatas based on preferences. It features role-based access, premium membership benefits, biodata management, and contact info requests via Stripe payment.
features: Private route protection with persistent login (no redirect after reload)
Premium membership with special biodata viewing privileges
Dynamic biodata filtering by age, gender, division
Success story section sorted by marriage date
Admin dashboard to approve contact info requests

title: Refocus Landing Page
tagline: A pixel-perfect clone of the Refokus agency site with smooth animations and scroll effects.
overview: This project replicates the Refokus agency website using modern frontend technologies. It features smooth scrolling, interactive animations, and a responsive design that mirrors the original site's aesthetics.
features: Responsive layout optimized for desktop and mobile devices
Smooth scrolling implemented with Locomotive Scroll
Interactive animations powered by GSAP and Shery.js
Component-based architecture using React.js
Custom hover effects and scroll-triggered animations
Optimized performance with lazy loading and efficient asset management
